Field Day (June 23 - 25)

Friday, June 23

  • Pick-up U-Haul. N3LI.
  • Pack equipment at mountaintop station and load into truck.
  • Set up antennas
    • 80/10m MyAntennas EFWH oriented roughly East/West
    • 80/10m MyAntennas EFWH oriented roughly East/West
  • Test antennas.

Saturday, June 24

  • Set up radio gear.
  • Set up power.
  • Set up computers and network.
  • Set up food & drink.
  • Set up info table.

2:00 PM EDT (1800 UTC) Field Day begins

Sunday, June 25
